Ghost in the Shell

Rank: 419


A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.


Director: Mamoru Oshii

Writer: Shirow Masamune, Kazunori Itô

Stars: Atsuko Tanaka, Iemasa Kayumi, Akio Ôtsuka

Tags: Adult Animation, Anime, Artificial Intelligence, Cop Drama, Cyber Thriller, Cyberpunk, Dystopian Sci,Fi, Hand,Drawn Animation, Police Procedural, Psychological Drama
